alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 2:35PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A cluster of Virga showers with isolated thunder will impact portions of west central Prowers, northwestern Baca, eastern Las Animas and southeastern Bent Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 233 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of Virga showers with isolated thunder 15 miles east of Higbee, or 25 miles southeast of North La Junta, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Prowers, northwestern Baca, eastern Las Animas and southeastern Bent Counties, including the following locations... Caddoa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
